ygData.subject: Re: On alliance again
ygData.msgSnippet: you do realize that the EQ game production company is called VERANT and not Variant , don t you??  Or was that a misunderstood pun? From:	Shawn Alley
ygData.messageBody:
you do realize that the EQ game production company is called VERANT
and not 'Variant', don't you?? Or was that a misunderstood pun?




From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...> on 05/19/99 12:58 PM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again

From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>

Is it possible there are other classes/spells in the game other than
enchanter? Don't be so narrow minded. Yes, this is the enchanters
list
but I said that Variant had improved some other spells (namely
Vampiric
Embrace for Necromancers) so you shouldn't lose hope. Once again,
if
there is something you don't like, tell Variant. If enough of us do
this (you can use /feedback) they will get the message and make a
change.

In the mean time use the things that work and try to be happy or
play
another class until the enchanter class is working to your
satisfaction.
My post was intended to help those who are commenting about all the
problems that some previously existing problems did get fixed!

-----Original Message-----
From: Hapke, Matthew [mailto:mahapke@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:36 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again


From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>

IMproved the effectiveness of what spells?!?
I have seen these improvements for us lately:

1. Memory Blur can now be resisted.
2. Whirl Can now be broken
3. Whirl now has a horridly random amount of time.

So, what exactly is better here?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shawn Alley [SMTP:ShawnA@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 2:23 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again
>
> From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
>
> Variant just improved the effectiveness of some spells. They may
work
> on this spell (and others) if we continue to let them know the
spell
> isn't doing what we expected. So keep your hopes up, this line of
> spells may be more powerful at some point!
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: HiFi Review [mailto:hifireview@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:18 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again
>
>
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> Then we can save a few coppers on our 100PP + platinum bars. :)
>
> --- Rob Berryhill <racefan@...> wrote:
> > From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
> >
> > It's pretty much worthless. If you use it for an
> > item that costs 100+pp you
> > *might* save a copper or two.
> >
> > Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
> > Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> >
> >
